long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ring our ezBELL for immediate teletherapy services!

Save time with E-Therapy's ezBELL, the quick, convenient browser extension that will notify E-Therapy's staffing manager that you need help at your PreK-12 school. After installing and enabling the plugin, just click the bell icon. From there, ezBELL will alert E-Therapy that your school needs access to the most qualified therapists, training, assessments, evaluations, and diagnostics.

Ring the ezBELL for quick access to E-Therapy's national team of licensed and credentialed clinicians:

- Speech Therapist (SLP)
- Occupational Therapist (OT)
- Physical Therapists (PT)
- Mental and Behavioral Health Specialist
- Assessments and Diagnostics

E-Therapy's ezBELL is completely free and unobtrusive. When you don't need it, it vanishes out of sight to declutter your browser. Use it only when you have a staffing need.

Download ezBELL today and be ready to ring our bell when you need extra help or have a short or long-term need.
